Kalamazoo.Comstock Public School District: The Comstock Public School District resides in Comstock Charter Township near the city of Kalamazoo, Michigan and is part of the Kalamazoo RESA Intermediate School District. Comstock Public Schools also serves portions of Kalamazoo Township, Pavilion Township, City of Portage, Michigan, and the City of Kalamazoo, Michigan. There were approximately 2,100 students enrolled in the school district in 2012.
